channel.title: Combat questions
channel.description:
Well, I have a few questions that relate to combat/pking.
First, can you disable the ::food command in combat?
Second, how do you make it so you can't attack anyone that isn't wearing armor + a weapon?
And lastly, right now on my server you can't make Ice Barrage/Melee hit stack together, do I have to change something so they will stack?
Thanks :)

item.title: Combat questions
item.dc:creator: @Fenam Fenam
